// ComplimentDex.js
import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import ComplimentModal from'./ComplimentModal';import compliments from'./complimentData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ComplimentDex(){const[unlocked,setUnlocked]=useState([]);const[selected,setSelected]=useState(null);const loadUnlocked=()=>{const saved=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('unlockedCompliments')||'[]');setUnlocked(saved);};useEffect(()=>{loadUnlocked();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-4 py-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center text-xl font-medium text-[#6D679D] tracking-wide mb-6",children:"I like you for..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-3 sm:grid-cols-4 md:grid-cols-5 gap-4 justify-items-center",children:compliments.map((_ref,index)=>{let{text,image,description}=_ref;const isUnlocked=unlocked.includes(text);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center text-center cursor-pointer",onClick:()=>setSelected({text,image,description,locked:!isUnlocked}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:text,className:`w-12 h-12 sm:w-14 sm:h-14 md:w-16 md:h-16 transition-all duration-300 ${isUnlocked?'':'opacity-20 grayscale'}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`mt-1 text-xs sm:text-sm font-medium text-gray-400`,children:isUnlocked?text:'???'})]},index);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center mt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-400 text-sm px-4 py-1 rounded-full",onClick:loadUnlocked,children:"Refresh"})}),selected&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ComplimentModal,{data:selected,onClose:()=>setSelected(null)})]});}
